author: 3xmd1559sporebraytondingo
content:
Could I please be directed toward discussion/work on "Few-Slot Finality" (if it exists)?

I would also appreciate "obvious insights" and subjective/qualitative perspectives, such as "SSF is much nicer than 2SF because of..." or "in terms of UX most of the benefits of finality are felt when... and so there are probably around 3 or 4 "sweet spots" that are practical".
